attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we just want people to stop torturing palestinians and bringing politics to get power and remove them from the holy land which originally belong to muslims, whether they were palestinians or israelies.
we want to be able to send aid ,food, medical in gaza where from women to children have been abused mentally by israeli army,we want them to have there rights.
they are not animals, they are humans like us with morals and desires. they have been tortured and hurt and murdered, no1 has politically given them justice, then why use politics to kill them?
we ask our pm to give aid, help with bringing peace and justice not only to palestinians, but true israelies who do not agree with this torture.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
